backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Cursor Agent Mode - Advanced reasoning and instruction following
original_prompt: Keep my Calendar up to date by committing to only meetings that are part of my priorities.

gutts.name: Priority Definition & Extraction
gutts.capability: Identify and structure user's priorities from context
gutts.user_goal: System understands what matters to the user
gutts.evidence: User priorities extracted from profile, documents, or explicit statements

gutts.name: Calendar Event Retrieval
gutts.capability: Access and load pending calendar invitations and scheduled meetings
gutts.user_goal: Get all meetings that need decision-making
gutts.evidence: Query calendar for all pending invitations and upcoming events

gutts.name: Meeting-Priority Alignment Scoring
gutts.capability: Evaluate how well each meeting aligns with stated priorities
gutts.user_goal: Know which meetings support goals and which don't
gutts.evidence: Score each meeting against priority criteria (0-100 alignment score)

gutts.name: Accept/Decline Decision Logic
gutts.capability: Determine which meetings to accept vs decline based on priority alignment

gutts.name: Calendar Action Execution
gutts.capability: Execute accept/decline actions on calendar system
gutts.evidence: API calls to accept/decline invitations with success confirmation

gutts.name: Decision Justification & Reporting
gutts.capability: Explain why each meeting was accepted or declined
gutts.user_goal: Understand the reasoning behind each decision
gutts.evidence: Generated report: 'Accepted: Aligns with Priority #1 (Product Launch), Score: 85'

notes: Generated by GPT-5 - Matches reference decomposition of 6 GUTTs
